    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_83014</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83014</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Determining the poles of a magnet using a compass</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bestimmung der Pfosten eines Magneten mit einem 
Kompaß</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Détermination des pôles d'un aimant à l'aide 
d'une boussole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determinando os pólos de um ímã usando um 
compasso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Determinazione dei poli di un magnete per mezzo 
di una bussola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθορισμός των πόλων ενός μαγνήτη που χρησιμοποιεί 
μια πυξίδα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Determinación de los postes de un imán usando un
compás</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a set-up on how to determine the north- and south-seeking poles of a magnet using a magnetic compass.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">compass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic fields</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">north-seeking poles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">south-seeking poles</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine Installation auf, wie 
man die Norden- und Süden-Suchenpfosten eines Magneten mit einem 
magnetischen Kompaß feststellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une installation sur la 
façon dont déterminer les pôles de nord et de sud-seeking d'un
aimant à l'aide d'une boussole magnétique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma instalação em como
determinar os pólos do norte e sul-procurar de um ímã usando um 
compasso magnético.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una messa a punto su 
come determinare i poli di sud-ricerca e di nord di un magnete per 
mezzo di una bussola magnetica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μια οργάνωση στο πώς να 
καθορίσει το Βορρά - και νότος-επιδιώκων τους πόλους ενός 
μαγνήτη χρησιμοποιώντας μια μαγνητική πυξίδα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una disposición en 
cómo determinar los postes del norte y el sur-buscar de un imán 
usando un compás magnético.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kompaß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fängt auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magneten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kompassähnliche Pfosten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Süden-suchende Pfosten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">boussole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champs magnétiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">aimants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pôles dirigés vers le nord</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">poteaux de sud-seeking</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">bussola</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pali stabilizzati al nord</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pali diricerca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πυξίδα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητικά πεδία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνήτες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βορράς-επιδίωξη των πόλων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">νότος-επιδίωξη των πόλων</string>

          </keyword>
